From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Grimlock kept smelling Repugnas. Yes, he knew this robot. It was an
Autobot. He sighed. That meant it would be wrong to rip it apart. "Me
say are you..." he was cut off as the two armor piercing shells hit him,
and exploded, sending him falling on his side. He snarled, turned his
head, and opened his mouth, letting loose a stream of laser fire at the
attacker. "Yeh, now Dinobots stomp."
